summary: Adds Tiffani, a wood elf assassin follower to your game.
descriptionHtml:
Just to get the point across - NO MORE WORK WILL BE DONE ON HER!
This was more of a test for me to see if I understand how to upload a mod, that's why it's not that great or exciting.

Tiffani Goldensoul is a wood elf assassin and thief who currently resides at Deadman's Drink in Falkreath. She is essential and levels with the player up to level 200. She utilizes bows, daggers, some spells and even shouts. She is marriageable (ONLY IF YOU DOWNLOAD THE OPTIONAL FILE VERSION!!!!) And is also a master level Lockpicking trainer.

This is my first mod so please let me know of any bugs.
You will most likely need the main ApachiiiSKyHair mod
(Sorry, didn't know how to make standalone)

What's next:
Well..... I broke Tiffani! Don't know how but I did. So yeah, No more work on her anymore.
Anyway, I'm working on a follower pack type thingy at the moment (I've got a lot of other things to do so it will take some time)

Now I know what you're thinking, ANOTHER FOLLOWER PACK HOW EXCITING *sarcasm intended*
Well, it's the only thing I've been able to get right in terms of modding.
author: Ebonnight969
